description: Complete support ticket lifecycle with SLA tracking, knowledge base, customer satisfaction surveys, and support analytics

test_cases.name: Customer Support Page Load
test_cases.description: Verify the customer support page loads correctly with all components
steps: Verify tabs are displayed (Tickets, Knowledge Base, Analytics, Surveys)
Verify loading state is handled properly
Verify error state is handled gracefully
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads with all components visible and functional

test_cases.name: Support Tickets Display
test_cases.description: Verify support tickets are displayed with correct information
steps: Verify each ticket shows number, title, priority, status, customer, assigned agent, dates
Verify ticket actions (View, Edit, Assign, Escalate, Resolve) are available
Verify ticket filters and search are available
test_cases.expected_result: Support tickets display with complete information and proper formatting

test_cases.name: Ticket Creation Form
test_cases.description: Test creating a new support ticket
steps: Fill in ticket details (title, description, priority, category, customer info)
Verify new ticket is created and appears in the list
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket creation form works correctly and creates new tickets

test_cases.name: Ticket Priority and Status Colors
test_cases.description: Test that ticket priority and status colors are displayed correctly
steps: Verify low priority shows appropriate color
Verify medium priority shows appropriate color
Verify high priority shows appropriate color
Verify urgent priority shows appropriate color
Verify critical priority shows appropriate color
Verify open status shows appropriate color
Verify in_progress status shows appropriate color
Verify resolved status shows appropriate color
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket priorities and statuses are displayed with proper color coding

test_cases.name: Ticket Assignment
test_cases.description: Test assigning tickets to support agents
steps: Verify ticket is assigned to the selected agent
Verify assignment is reflected in the ticket list
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket assignment works correctly and updates ticket status

test_cases.name: Ticket Escalation
test_cases.description: Test escalating tickets to higher priority or different agents
steps: Find a ticket that can be escalated
Verify ticket priority may be updated
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket escalation works correctly with proper logging

test_cases.name: Ticket Resolution
test_cases.description: Test resolving tickets with resolution details
steps: Find a ticket that can be resolved
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket resolution works correctly with proper status updates

test_cases.name: Knowledge Base Display
test_cases.description: Verify knowledge base articles are displayed correctly
steps: Verify each article shows title, category, status, view count, helpful count
Verify article actions (View, Edit, Delete, Publish) are available
Verify article filters and search are available
test_cases.expected_result: Knowledge base displays all articles with complete information

test_cases.name: Knowledge Base Article Creation
test_cases.description: Test creating a new knowledge base article
steps: Fill in article details (title, content, summary, category, tags)
Verify new article is created and appears in the list
test_cases.expected_result: Knowledge base article creation works correctly

test_cases.name: Support Analytics Display
test_cases.description: Verify support analytics are displayed correctly
steps: Verify SLA compliance metrics are displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Support analytics display all key metrics and charts

test_cases.name: Customer Satisfaction Surveys
steps: Verify each survey shows title, status, response count, satisfaction score
Verify survey actions (View, Edit, Send, Analyze) are available
test_cases.expected_result: Customer satisfaction surveys display correctly with all information

test_cases.name: SLA Tracking and Management
test_cases.description: Test SLA tracking and deadline management
steps: Verify SLA deadlines are displayed on tickets
Verify SLA breach notifications are shown
Verify SLA compliance metrics are accurate
Verify SLA escalation rules work correctly
test_cases.expected_result: SLA tracking and management works correctly

test_cases.name: Ticket Filtering and Search
test_cases.description: Test ticket filtering and search functionality
steps: Use status filter to filter tickets
Verify only tickets with selected status are shown
Use priority filter to filter tickets
Verify only tickets with selected priority are shown
Use category filter to filter tickets
Verify only tickets with selected category are shown
Use search to find specific tickets
Verify multiple filters can be combined
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket filtering and search work correctly

test_cases.name: Ticket Comments and Communication
test_cases.description: Test ticket comments and customer communication
steps: Verify comment is added to the ticket
Verify comment author and timestamp are shown
Verify internal vs external comments are distinguished
Verify comment types are properly categorized
Verify customer notifications work for external comments
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket comments and communication work correctly

test_cases.name: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify graceful handling when API fails or data is missing
steps: Simulate API failure (network error or 500 response)
Verify page remains functional after error
Verify retry mechanism works if available
Verify empty state is handled gracefully
Verify form validation errors are displayed properly
test_cases.expected_result: Page handles API failures gracefully with proper error display
